page.title: Projects
page.content: University projects, exercises from books and independent projects.

contents.shortDescription: Full responsive portfolio website based on React JS
contents.longDescription: This is my first React JS project, all the contents of this website are based on different JSON files. The visual design style is modified from Google material design, and the components are modified based on React-Boostrap.

contents.shortDescription: Single page Website Design with elegant black scheme.
contents.longDescription: Front-end website design as a modern style landing page template. Powered by Bulma and Animate.CSS.

contents.shortDescription: Simple To-Do App. Implentating props and states of React JS
contents.longDescription: A simple To-Do App. User can add new tasks and hide completed ones. Not using server side so it will reset after reloading the page.
A modern design slide gallery based on jQuery, included information icon to know more about stories behind each picture. Fully responsive.

contents.shortDescription: Prototype of my photography portfolio. Full responsive single webite.
contents.longDescription: A prototype of my own photography portfolio website. Initially laid out in Photoshop, put into practice in coding from scratch, structure based on Bootstrap. Fully responsive to different platforms.

contents.shortDescription: Simple album based on Handlebar JS
contents.longDescription: The album is based on JSON files to read all the pictures and categories. With filter features, user can change the category of the animals. Fully responsive to different platforms and with clean design style. This is an exercise based on the Responsive Web Design course on Coursera by Goldsmiths, University of London.

contents.shortDescription: Notes of what I learned in courses or books
contents.longDescription: I used evernote to take notes, until I found gitbook is so much better to take notes of codes and share with others.

contents.shortDescription: A web app of aggregating website.
contents.longDescription: A website aggreater app based on Meteor JS. The app allows users to create account, login and vote or recommend new websites to the list. This is an exercise based on Introduction to Meteor.js Development course on Coursera by Goldsmiths, University of London.

contents.shortDescription: A classic action game made in P5 JS
contents.longDescription: Based on p5 JS and p5 play js, the game is controlled by arrow-keys. The game scrolls automatically and includes classic mario music and sound effects, player can experience a different mario game to the original one.
Minimal design is my favorite. This is a simple background changing web page for practicing jQuery by modifying the css and layout in a minimalistic design style.

projects.name: Think like a programmer exercise Ch2-2-2

contents.longDescription: My solution to the exercise. The main question is to generate the image in the picture with a limited count command. A really good practice for dividing problems and solving from smaller parts. I really recommend book.

projects.name: Think like a programmer exercise Ch2-2-3

contents.longDescription: My solution to the exercise. The main question is to generate the image in the picture with a limited count command. A really good practice for dividing problems and solving from smaller parts. I really recommend book..
